data.name: AppTitle
data.comment: Title of the main dialog

data.name: BouncynessValueOutOfRange
data.value: La valeur de saut (actuellement {0}) doit être entre 0 et 0.5
data.comment: Message to shown when the bouncyness value of the grid with animation exceeds the range, must be within [0;0.5]

data.name: BucketColumnDisplay
data.comment: The value displayed in the minimized version of the buckets column

data.name: UserSettingsNotOpened
data.value: Les paramètres n'ont pas pu être crée. Affirmez que le lecteur n'est pas plein.
data.comment: Message to display when something fails during deserialization of UserSettings.

data.name: UserSettingsNotSaved
data.value: Les paramètres n'ont pas pu être savegardés. Affirmez que le lecteur n'est pas plein. Voulez vour vraiment quitter?
data.comment: Message to display when something fails during serialization of UserSettings.

data.name: SettingsNotSavedMsgBoxTitle
data.value: Erreur lors de la sauvegarde des paramètres
data.comment: Caption of the messagebox which is displayed when saving failed on closing.

data.name: CDDBEntryChooserTitle
data.comment: Title of the CDDB Chooser Dialog

data.name: CDDriveLabel
data.comment: Label text for label left of the cd drives combobox

data.name: continueImportText
data.comment: Text appearing on the start import button after a import has started

data.name: FileMenuClose
data.comment: Title of the "Close" entry in the file menu

data.name: FileMenuAddBucket
data.comment: Title of the "Add Bucket" entry in the file menu

data.name: FileMenuOpenBucket
data.comment: Title of the "Open Bucket" entry in the file menu

data.name: FileMenuTitle
data.comment: Title of the file menu

data.name: FrequencyOutOfRange
data.value: La frequence de l'animation doit être entre 1 et 2134
data.comment: Message to show when the bounce animation frequency is out of range.

data.name: HelpMenuTitle
data.comment: Title of the "Help" menu

data.name: ImportColumnDisplay
data.comment: The value displayed in the minimized version of the import column

data.name: ImportLVColumnArtist
data.comment: Import Listview Title of "Artist" Column

data.name: ImportLVColumnGenre
data.comment: Import Listview Title of the "Genre" Colums

data.name: ImportLVColumnTrackNr
data.comment: Import Listview Title of "Track number" Column

data.comment: Import Listview Title of "Track Title" column

data.name: ImportLVColumnYear
data.comment: Import Listview Title of the "Year" column

data.name: NoCDDBEntriesFound
data.value: Aucune entrée trouvée dans la base de données CDDB
data.comment: Message saying that the inserted cd doesn't contain a cddb entry ( yet)

data.name: NoCDDriveSelected
data.comment: Message to display when a cd drive is selected

data.name: NoCDInserted
data.value: Aucun CD entré ou Cd non lisible
data.comment: Message to display when the CD TOC couldn't be read

data.name: PlayerColumnDisplay
data.comment: The minimized value of the player column.

data.name: SharpnessValueOutOfRange
data.value: La valeur de causticité (actuellement {0}) doit être entre 0 et 1 (1 exclus)
data.comment: Message to shown when sharpness values of the grid with animation exceeds the range, must be within [0;1[

data.name: startImportText
data.comment: Text appearing on the start import button

data.name: noBucketSelectedText
data.value: musique est censé d'être placée das des bidons, veuillez choisier au moins u bidon
data.comment: Text being displayed if not tries to make and import without having buckets selecte

data.name: addBucketButtonText
data.comment: Text on the add bucket button

data.name: Cancel
data.comment: this is rather self-explanatory, isn't it?

data.name: copyToBucketError
data.value: Quelque chose de mal s'est passée lord de l'écriture dans le bidon situé a {0}, est-ce que le bidon peut être remplit?
data.comment: Text to display when copying the file to the bucket fails during import, argument is the bucket location

data.name: importTerminated
data.comment: import terminated message

data.name: NewBucketDialogButtonOK
data.comment: ok button text, this should be a little alternative, not something like "yes", or "ok"

data.name: NewBucketDialogIncludeSubfolders
data.comment: Checkbox text on NewBucketDialog

data.comment: The select folder button text on NewBucketDialog

data.comment: The title of the new bucket dialog

data.comment: TextBlock text above the title textbox

data.comment: Text on the remove bucket button

data.comment: appears after the path in de bucket description display

data.comment: appears after the path in de bucket description display

data.name: BucketDescriptionPathPrefix
data.comment: appears before the path in the bucket description display

data.comment: appears before the bucket title in the bucket description display
